newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * The Prime Minister of ex-Soviet Moldova is visiting Romania's Cernavoda nuclear power plant on the second day of his visit.

* Romanian Foreign Minister Adrian Severin met his Yugoslav counterpart Milan Milutinovic to discuss boosting bilateral relations and exchange documents for the ratification of the basic treaty between the two Balkan neighbours.
* The National Liberal Party, member of the ruling coalition, has opened its congress in Bucharest to elect its leaders and set the strategy for the next elections, due in the year 2000.
